physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Micrognathia, cleft palate, retroglossoptosis, significant respiratory obstruction requiring tracheostomy, temporal avascularity in the right eye, temporal retinal detachment (macula off) in the left eye, dragging of temporal vessels to an area of fibrosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The retinal detachment in the left eye progressed, and a temporal falciform retinal fold was evident at 12 months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Visual function and fundal appearance remained stable in the right eye after laser photocoagulation.
